description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget, SpendingPieChart, that renders a stylized pie chart for category analytics, including a custom painter _PieChartPainter for drawing the chart segments.

classes.name: SpendingPieChart
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a pie chart based on category data with optional color customization.

classes.name: _PieChartPainter
classes.description: A CustomPainter that draws the segments of the pie chart based on provided values and colors.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the SpendingPieChart, including the pie chart and legend.

methods.name: paint
methods.description: Draws the pie segments on the canvas based on the values and colors.

methods.name: shouldRepaint
methods.description: Determines if the painter should repaint; returns false for static painting.
